name: End Users - Mobile App
description: Primary users of the company's flagship mobile application.

impacts.description_of_impact: Frequent app crashes and slow performance leading to frustration and task incompletion.
Loss of trust in the application and brand due to unreliability.

research_targets: Active users who have reported issues in the last 30 days; Users with session times below average.
key_concerns_or_needs: Reliable app performance, quick resolution of bugs, intuitive interface.

name: Customer Support Team
description: Team responsible for handling user complaints and issues.

impacts.description_of_impact: Increased volume of support tickets related to the problem, leading to higher workload and burnout.
Increased operational costs due to overtime and need for more support agents.

research_targets: Support team leads, agents with high ticket resolution rates, agents handling escalated issues.
key_concerns_or_needs: Reduced ticket volume, better tools for diagnosing the problem, clear communication on fixes.

name: Marketing Department
description: Team responsible for product promotion and brand image.

impacts.description_of_impact: Negative reviews and social media mentions harming brand perception and marketing campaign effectiveness.
Difficulty in acquiring new users and retaining existing ones due to the problem.

research_targets: Marketing managers, social media managers, campaign analysts.
key_concerns_or_needs: Positive brand image, effective campaigns, user growth and retention.

name: Development Team
description: Team responsible for building and maintaining the application.

impacts.description_of_impact: Diverted from new feature development to firefighting and bug fixing related to the problem.
Decreased morale due to persistent issues and pressure to fix them quickly.

research_targets: Tech leads, senior developers involved in the affected modules.
key_concerns_or_needs: Clear problem definition, stable codebase, ability to focus on planned work.
